text: P.J. is a 1968 American mystery movie directed by John Guillermin and starring George Peppard, Raymond Burr, Gayle Hunnicutt, Brock Peters, Wilfrid Hyde- White, Jason Evers, Susan Saint James. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1968 movies Category:1960s mystery movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies directed by John Guillermin
title: P.J.
